entry.title: Monday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.

Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
